name: Home Farm
description:
Welcome to our farm - Home farm, a modernized farm machinery. Player has to reclaim, buy land, build cages, buy machinery ... for cultivation, production. In addition. Player not only buying appropriate seeds, plants, and livestock to create a marketable product but also buying mining forests and expand into sea fishing.
Main functions of the game:
- Buying land for planting trees, take care of harvesting products.
- Buying food machine, bakery machine ...
- Providing products for restaurants, supermarkets ...
- Breaking stone, cut trees, level forest for arable land
- Purchasing farm decorations.
Please try Home farm to entertain and be relaxing.
publishers: IDTV  Viet  Nam Development Technology And Trading Investment Joint Stock Company
